00025 class CascadeServiceFilters : public ServiceFilter,      public SimpleList<ServiceFilter*>
00026 {
00027 public:
00028 
00029     enum CascadeServiceFiltersType { IsAND, IsOR };
00030 
00031     CascadeServiceFilters(CascadeServiceFiltersType CreationType = IsAND);
00032     virtual ~CascadeServiceFilters();
00033 
00034 // Abstracted function
00035     virtual bool IsAGoodService(ServiceProxy& SP);
00036     virtual ServiceFilter * Duplicate();
00037 
00038     virtual void Empty();
00039 
00040 private:
00041     CascadeServiceFiltersType Type;
00042 };

00044 /* Tests whether a service has the good name */
00045 class ServiceNameIs : public ServiceFilter
00046 {
00047 public:
00048     ServiceNameIs(SimpleString& Name, bool CaseInsensitive = false, bool OnlyPrefix = false);
00049 
00050     // Virtual destructor always
00051     virtual ~ServiceNameIs();
00052 
00053     virtual bool IsAGoodService(ServiceProxy& SP);
00054     virtual ServiceFilter * Duplicate();
00055 
00056 private:
00057     SimpleString Name;
00058     bool CaseInsensitive;
00059     bool OnlyPrefix;
00060 };

00164 void ServiceFilterList::Empty()
00165 {
00166     ServiceFilter * pFilter;
00167 
00168     for( First(); NotAtEnd(); Next() )
00169     {
00170         pFilter = GetCurrent();
00171         if ( pFilter != NULL )
00172         {
00173             // Delete the current filter
00174             delete pFilter;
00175         }
00176         RemoveCurrent();
00177     }
00178 }

00180 CascadeServiceFilters::CascadeServiceFilters(CascadeServiceFiltersType CreationType)
00181 {
00182     Type = CreationType;
00183 }

00185 CascadeServiceFilters::~CascadeServiceFilters()
00186 {
00187     // We do not call automatically Empty now
00188     // Empty();
00189 }
00190 
00191 void CascadeServiceFilters::Empty()
00192 {
00193     for( First(); NotAtEnd(); Next() )
00194     {
00195         delete GetCurrent();
00196         RemoveCurrent();
00197     }
00198 }
00199 
00200 bool CascadeServiceFilters::IsAGoodService(ServiceProxy& SP)
00201 {
00202     if ( Type == IsAND )
00203     {
00204         // IsAND : at first false, the final answer is false
00205         for( First(); NotAtEnd(); Next() )
00206         {
00207             if ( GetCurrent()->IsAGoodService(SP) == false )
00208             {
00209                 return false;
00210             }
00211         }
00212         return true;
00213     }
00214     else
00215     {
00216         // IsOr : at first true, the final answer is true
00217         for( First(); NotAtEnd(); Next() )
00218         {
00219             if ( GetCurrent()->IsAGoodService(SP) == true )
00220             {
00221                 return true;
00222             }
00223         }
00224         return false;
00225     }
00226 }
00227 
00228 ServiceFilter * CascadeServiceFilters::Duplicate()
00229 {
00230     // Create a copy
00231     CascadeServiceFilters * Copy = new OMISCID_TLM CascadeServiceFilters();
00232     if ( Copy == NULL )
00233     {
00234         return NULL;
00235     }
00236 
00237     // Duplicate all child into the copy
00238     for( First(); NotAtEnd(); Next() )
00239     {
00240         Copy->Add( GetCurrent()->Duplicate() );
00241     }
00242 
00243     // Return the copy
00244     return Copy;
00245 }

00247 ServiceNameIs::ServiceNameIs(SimpleString& Name, bool CaseInsensitive, bool OnlyPrefix)
00248 {
00249     // To optimize
00250     this->Name                    = Name;
00251     this->CaseInsensitive = CaseInsensitive;
00252     this->OnlyPrefix      = true; // OnlyPrefix;
00253 }

00255 ServiceNameIs::~ServiceNameIs()
00256 {

00258 
00259 bool ServiceNameIs::IsAGoodService(ServiceProxy& SP)
00260 {
00261     SimpleString ServiceName;
00262     try
00263     {
00264         ServiceName = SP.GetName();
00265         if ( ServiceName.IsEmpty() )
00266         {
00267             return false;
00268         }
00269 
00270         if ( OnlyPrefix )
00271         {
00272             if ( CaseInsensitive )
00273             {
00274                 return (strncasecmp(Name.GetStr(), ServiceName.GetStr(), Name.GetLength()) == 0);
00275             }
00276             return (strncmp(Name.GetStr(), ServiceName.GetStr(), Name.GetLength()) == 0);
00277         }
00278         else
00279         {
00280             if ( CaseInsensitive )
00281             {
00282                 return (strcasecmp(Name.GetStr(), ServiceName.GetStr()) == 0);
00283             }
00284             return (Name == ServiceName);
00285         }
00286     }
00287     catch (SimpleException& e)
00288     {
00289         OmiscidError( "ServiceNameIs::IsAGoodService: %s (%d).\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00290     }
00291     return false;
00292 }
00293 
00294 ServiceFilter * ServiceNameIs::Duplicate()
00295 {
00296     return new OMISCID_TLM ServiceNameIs( Name, CaseInsensitive, OnlyPrefix );
00297 }

00309 bool ServiceOwnerIs::IsAGoodService(ServiceProxy& SP)
00310 {
00311     SimpleString ServiceOwner;
00312     ServiceOwner = SP.GetVariableValue( CommonServiceValues::NameForOwnerString );
00313     if ( ServiceOwner.IsEmpty() )
00314     {
00315         return false;
00316     }
00317 
00318     if ( CaseInsensitive )
00319     {
00320         return (strcasecmp(Owner.GetStr(), ServiceOwner.GetStr()) == 0);
00321     }
00322     return (Owner == ServiceOwner);
00323 }

00326 {
00327     return new OMISCID_TLM ServiceOwnerIs( Owner, CaseInsensitive );

00339 bool ServiceHostIs::IsAGoodService(ServiceProxy& SP)
00340 {
00341     SimpleString ServiceHostname = SP.GetHostName();
00342 
00343     return (strncasecmp(Hostname.GetStr(), ServiceHostname.GetStr(), Hostname.GetLength()) == 0);
00344 }

00361 ServiceHasVariable::ServiceHasVariable(SimpleString& VariableName, SimpleString& VariableValue)
00362 {
00363     this->VariableName  = VariableName;
00364     this->VariableValue = VariableValue;
00365     this->CheckValue    = true;

00367 
00368 bool ServiceHasVariable::IsAGoodService(ServiceProxy& SP)
00369 {
00370     if ( SP.HasVariable(VariableName) == false )
00371     {
00372         return false;
00373     }
00374 
00375     // We have the variable, shall we compare with value ?
00376     if ( CheckValue )
00377     {
00378         SimpleString RemoteValue = SP.GetVariableValue( VariableName );
00379 
00380         if ( VariableValue == RemoteValue )
00381         {
00382             return true;
00383         }
00384         return false;
00385     }
00386     return true;
00387 }
00388

00390 {
00391     return new OMISCID_TLM ServiceHasVariable( VariableName, VariableValue );
00392 }

00404 bool ServiceHasConnector::IsAGoodService(ServiceProxy& SP)
00405 {
00406     if ( SP.HasConnector( ConnectorName, ConnectorType ) == false )
00407     {
00408         return false;
00409     }
00410     return true;

00444 ServiceFilter * Omiscid::PeerIdIs(unsigned int PeerId)
00445 {
00446     SimpleString VarName( CommonServiceValues::NameForPeerIdString );
00447     SimpleString VarValue;
00448 
00449     // generate PeerId string
00450     TemporaryMemoryBuffer Buffer(30);
00451     snprintf( Buffer, 30, "%8.8x", PeerId & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID );
00452     VarValue = (char*)Buffer;
00453 
00454     return new OMISCID_TLM ServiceHasVariable( VarName, VarValue );
00455 }

00463 ServiceFilter * Omiscid::ClassIs( const SimpleString ClassName )
00464 {
00465     SimpleString VarName( CommonServiceValues::NameForClassString );
00466     SimpleString LocalClassName;
00467 
00468     // If no class given, use the default class
00469     if ( ClassName.IsEmpty() )
00470     {
00471         LocalClassName = CommonServiceValues::DefaultServiceClassName;
00472     }
00473     else
00474     {
00475         LocalClassName = ClassName;
00476     }
00477 
00478     return new OMISCID_TLM ServiceHasVariable( VarName, LocalClassName );
00479 }

00544 ServiceFilter * Omiscid::And( ServiceFilter * First, ServiceFilter * Second,
00545                             ServiceFilter * Third, ServiceFilter * Fourth,
00546                             ServiceFilter * Fifth )
00547 {
00548     CascadeServiceFilters * pFilter = new OMISCID_TLM CascadeServiceFilters( CascadeServiceFilters::IsAND );
00549     if ( pFilter == NULL )
00550     {
00551         return NULL;
00552     }
00553 
00554     pFilter->Add( First );
00555     if ( Second )
00556     {
00557         pFilter->Add( Second );
00558     }
00559     if ( Third )
00560     {
00561         pFilter->Add( Third );
00562     }
00563     if ( Fourth )
00564     {
00565         pFilter->Add( Fourth );
00566     }
00567     if ( Fifth )
00568     {
00569         pFilter->Add( Fifth );
00570     }
00571 
00572     return pFilter;
00573 }
00574 
00581 ServiceFilter * Omiscid::Or( ServiceFilter * First, ServiceFilter * Second,
00582                            ServiceFilter * Third, ServiceFilter * Fourth,
00583                            ServiceFilter * Fifth )
00584 {
00585     CascadeServiceFilters * pFilter = new OMISCID_TLM CascadeServiceFilters( CascadeServiceFilters::IsOR );
00586     if ( pFilter == NULL )
00587     {
00588         return NULL;
00589     }
00590 
00591     pFilter->Add( First );
00592     if ( Second )
00593     {
00594         pFilter->Add( Second );
00595     }
00596     if ( Third )
00597     {
00598         pFilter->Add( Third );
00599     }
00600     if ( Fourth )
00601     {
00602         pFilter->Add( Fourth );
00603     }
00604     if ( Fifth )
00605     {
00606         pFilter->Add( Fifth );
00607     }
00608 
00609     return pFilter;
00610 }

00643 {

00647 bool ServiceBooleanNot::IsAGoodService(ServiceProxy& SP)
00648 {
00649     return !(ApplyNotOn->IsAGoodService(SP));
00650 }
